channel.title: junsircoding
channel.description: Get busy living, or get busy dying.

item.title: Use Plotly Python to draw a heatmap and customize a non-uniform colorbar
item.author: 小骏
item.description: This article introduces how to use the Plotly to draw a heatmap chart, customize a non-uniform colorbar, and finally compare the visual effect of the graph with Matplotlib’s pcolormesh. The webpage allows direct preview and manipulation of Plotly charts.
